34class MutablePageMetadata;
35class WeakObjects;
36
37struct MemoryChunkData {
38 intptr_t live_bytes;
39 std::unique_ptr<TypedSlots> typed_slots;
40};
41
42// This class is a wrapper around an unordered_map that defines the minimum
43// interface to be usable in marking. It aims to provide faster access in the
44// common case where the requested element is the same as the one previously
45// tried.
46class MemoryChunkDataMap final {
47 using MemoryChunkDataMapT =
48 std::unordered_map<MutablePageMetadata*, MemoryChunkData,
49 base::hash<MutablePageMetadata*>>;
50
51 public:
52 MemoryChunkDataMapT::mapped_type& operator[](
53 const MemoryChunkDataMapT::key_type& key) {
54 // nullptr value is used to indicate absence of a last key.
55 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(key);
56
57 if (key == last_key_) {
58 return *last_mapped_;
59 }
60
61 auto it = map_.find(key);
62 if (it == map_.end()) {
63 auto result = map_.emplace(key, MemoryChunkData());
64 DCHECK(result.second);
65 it = result.first;
66 }
67
68 last_key_ = key;
69 last_mapped_ = &it->second;
70
71 return it->second;
72 }
73
74 MemoryChunkDataMapT::size_type erase(
75 const MemoryChunkDataMapT::key_type& key) {
76 last_key_ = nullptr;
77 last_mapped_ = nullptr;
78 return map_.erase(key);
79 }
80
81 // No iterator is cached in this class so an actual find() has to be executed
82 // everytime.
83 MemoryChunkDataMapT::iterator find(const MemoryChunkDataMapT::key_type& key) {
84 return map_.find(key);
85 }
86
87 MemoryChunkDataMapT::iterator begin() { return map_.begin(); }
88 MemoryChunkDataMapT::const_iterator end() { return map_.end(); }
89
90 void clear() {
91 last_key_ = nullptr;
92 last_mapped_ = nullptr;
93 map_.clear();
94 }
95
96 bool empty() const { return map_.empty(); }
97
98 private:
99 MemoryChunkDataMapT::key_type last_key_ = nullptr;
100 MemoryChunkDataMapT::mapped_type* last_mapped_ = nullptr;
101 MemoryChunkDataMapT map_;
102};
103
104class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE ConcurrentMarking {
105 public:
106 // When the scope is entered, the concurrent marking tasks
107 // are preempted and are not looking at the heap objects, concurrent marking
108 // is resumed when the scope is exited.
109 class V8_NODISCARD PauseScope {
110 public:
111 explicit PauseScope(ConcurrentMarking* concurrent_marking);
112 ~PauseScope();
113
114 private:
115 ConcurrentMarking* const concurrent_marking_;
116 const bool resume_on_exit_;
117 };
118
119 ConcurrentMarking(Heap* heap, WeakObjects* weak_objects);
120 ~ConcurrentMarking();
121
122 // Schedules asynchronous job to perform concurrent marking at |priority|.
123 // Objects in the heap should not be moved while these are active (can be
124 // stopped safely via Stop() or PauseScope).
125 void TryScheduleJob(GarbageCollector garbage_collector,
126 TaskPriority priority = TaskPriority::kUserVisible);
127
128 // Waits for scheduled job to complete.
129 void Join();
130 // Preempts ongoing job ASAP. Returns true if concurrent marking was in
131 // progress, false otherwise.
132 bool Pause();
133
134 // Schedules asynchronous job to perform concurrent marking at |priority| if
135 // not already running, otherwise adjusts the number of workers running job
136 // and the priority if different from the default kUserVisible.
137 void RescheduleJobIfNeeded(
138 GarbageCollector garbage_collector,
139 TaskPriority priority = TaskPriority::kUserVisible);
140 // Flushes native context sizes to the given table of the main thread.
141 void FlushNativeContexts(NativeContextStats* main_stats);
142 // Flushes memory chunk data.
143 void FlushMemoryChunkData();
144 // This function is called for a new space page that was cleared after
145 // scavenge and is going to be re-used.
146 void ClearMemoryChunkData(MutablePageMetadata* chunk);
147 // Flushes pretenuring feedback.
148 void FlushPretenuringFeedback();
149
150 // Checks if all threads are stopped.
151 bool IsStopped();
152
153 size_t TotalMarkedBytes();
154
155 void set_another_ephemeron_iteration(bool another_ephemeron_iteration) {
156 another_ephemeron_iteration_.store(another_ephemeron_iteration);
157 }
158 bool another_ephemeron_iteration() {
159 return another_ephemeron_iteration_.load();
160 }
161
162 GarbageCollector garbage_collector() const {
163 DCHECK(garbage_collector_.has_value());
164 return garbage_collector_.value();
165 }
166
167 bool IsWorkLeft() const;
168
169 size_t FetchAndResetConcurrencyEstimate() {
170 const size_t estimate =
171 estimate_concurrency_.exchange(0, std::memory_order_relaxed);
172 return estimate ? estimate : 1;
173 }
174
175 private:
176 struct TaskState;
177 class JobTaskMinor;
178 class JobTaskMajor;
179 class MinorMarkingState;
180
181 void RunMinor(JobDelegate* delegate);
182 template <YoungGenerationMarkingVisitationMode marking_mode>
183 size_t RunMinorImpl(JobDelegate* delegate, TaskState* task_state);
184 void RunMajor(JobDelegate* delegate,
185 base::EnumSet<CodeFlushMode> code_flush_mode,
186 unsigned mark_compact_epoch, bool should_keep_ages_unchanged);
187 size_t GetMajorMaxConcurrency(size_t worker_count);
188 size_t GetMinorMaxConcurrency(size_t worker_count);
189 void Resume();
190
191 std::unique_ptr<JobHandle> job_handle_;
192 Heap* const heap_;
193 base::Optional<GarbageCollector> garbage_collector_;
194 MarkingWorklists* marking_worklists_;
195 WeakObjects* const weak_objects_;
196 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<TaskState>> task_state_;
197 std::atomic<size_t> total_marked_bytes_{0};
198 std::atomic<bool> another_ephemeron_iteration_{false};
199 base::Optional<uint64_t> current_job_trace_id_;
200 std::unique_ptr<MinorMarkingState> minor_marking_state_;
201 std::atomic<size_t> estimate_concurrency_{0};
202
203 friend class Heap;
204};
205
206} // namespace internal
207} // namespace v8
